content: round 7 single_crochet in each single_crochet 13 stitches round 8 decrease single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat 4 times single_crochet last stitch 9 stitches when done slip_stitch and pull yarn tail through to knot leaving long enough tail to attach claw to body claw thumb chain 5 turn single_crochet in each single_crochet slip last stitch and pull yarn tail through to knot leaving long enough tail to attach thumb to claw sew claw thumb to vertical side of claw repeat instructions for second claw crab legs make 6 chain 10 turn 2 double_crochet double_crochet in first chain from hook repeat 4 times half_double_crochet half_double_crochet in second to last chain single_crochet in last chain slip to knot leaving long enough tail to attach leg to body repeat instructions until you have 6 legs crab eyes make 2 use 4 25mm crochet hook iris using white yarn follow directions for starting a magic magic_ring found at http //www crochetme com/dec_jan_0405/reads_round html do steps 1 to 6 of magic_ring instructions chain 2 round 1 4 single_crochet into loop 4 stitches slip to knot leaving long enough tail to attach iris to eye stalk pupil using black yarn french knot in iris circle eye stalk using body color yarn chain 5 turn double_crochet in second chain from hook single_crochet to end slip to knot leaving long enough tail to attach eye stalk to body sew iris to eye stalk assembly attach claws to front of body making sure thumbs are facing each other attach legs behind claws towards the back of the body attach eye stalks above and between claws embroider a mouth under eyes your crab is complete photo courtesy of mel http //www moonrakerbeads com/
